name: Puzzle Packed IQ Games
description:
Puzzle Packed IQ Games, is an simple but addictive puzzle game collection. “Your target is to rescue the red block out of surrounds.” It's an challenge task!
We have carefully prepared three different types of gameplay for you.

1. Klotski (406 levels)
2. Move it out (25185 levels)
3. Slide Fifteen (80 levels)

All gameplay supports the following features:
- Unlimited hints which can help you to pass the level
- Shortest steps at each levels
- Game records and rankings
- Light, dark, skin-tone theme

Have fun! Any questions, please feel free to contact us 7saiwen@gmail.com
